name: Sofa
description:
Client (28 y/o) is separated with 2 children, aged 7 and 1, who are under her care. The older child is attending primary school, while the younger is being cared for by her on her own. As the client is currently unemployed due to health issues, the family's finances have been tight, and they have been receiving SSO assistance over the past few months. They are currently in need of a new sofa and are seeking a donation, as they are unable to purchase one due to their tight financial situation.

Looking for a sofa that is around these dimensions due to space constraints: Length - 185cm, Width - 70cm.

description: Client comes from a low-income family and is doing her best to care for her elderly mother while working part-time as a cleaner to support her children, who are still in school. name: Sofa bed
description: A caregiver with mobility challenges and her two grandchildren live in a 1-room rental flat. Her 3 children are currently incarcerated and will be released this year. They do not have alternative housing arrangements and will be living in the flat. Due to space constraints, my caregiver hopes to receive a 3-seater sofa bed so that the family can live more comfortably temporarily until further housing arrangements can be made and processed. She hopes to receive either a new or pre-loved sofa bed, not of cloth material. Do reach out to Marilyn at 81214654 for further clarifications. Thank you!

name: Bicycle
description:
Sunbeam Place @ Children’s Society is requesting 2 medium-sized bicycles suitable for children aged 10 years and above.
These bicycles will be used to teach residents how to ride and for their general use.

Delivery will need to be arranged by the kind donor.
If you wish to contribute, please click “Donate”, and we will get in touch with you soon.

We sincerely thank you for your kindness and generosity in advance.

name: Tablet
description:
"The client is the primary caregiver for her two school-going teenage children. She is currently medically unfit for work due to physical and mental health concerns and is in the midst of divorce proceedings. At present, she has no source of income. Despite her financial challenges, the client continues to meet household expenses and provide for her children through external family support and donations. 

The client is seeking assistance for a tablet to support her children’s educational needs. The device is necessary for school assignments, accessing online learning platforms, and completing home-based learning tasks. Due to her lack of income and ongoing financial strain, she is unable to afford a laptop on her own. For further information, please contact Seelvi at 8699 3152 or via email at seelvi.nadarasan@thkmc.org.sg. Thank you."

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Norlizawati Binte Hamid

name: Commode
description:
Request assistance for a brand new commode for an elderly lady from a family of three, consisting of two elderly parents and an adult daughter.

The daughter is the full-time caregiver for both parents and is unable to work, hence the family currently has no source of income and is surviving on their savings. The existing commode is no longer suitable, and a replacement is urgently needed due to hygiene concerns.

If the request is feasible, please WhatsApp me at 8800 3073 and I can provide an image or Shopee link of the suitable commode. Delivery can be made directly to the family’s address.

passiton.name: Commode
passiton.description: Commode with blue bucket at the bottom.

passiton.name: Commode with pot (no cover)
passiton.description: Commode on wheels and pot (no cover)
passiton.location: Ang Mo Kio, Bishan, Braddell, Thomson

passiton.name: Commode Chair
passiton.description:
This item is a 3-in-1 folding steel commode chair, often used as a bedside toilet for individuals with limited mobility. 
Versatile Design: Functions as a bedside commode, a raised toilet seat, or a safety frame over an existing toilet. 
Construction: Features a durable, powder-coated steel frame and a removable plastic bucket with a lid. 
Adjustability: Designed to be height-adjustable to fit different users and folds flat for easy storage or transport. 
Capacity: Typically supports a weight capacity of up to 350 lbs (approximately 159 kg).

passiton.name: Mobile Mini Shower Commode (Fixed Armrests)
passiton.description:
This is a compact 3-in-1 mobility aid for narrow spaces. Please read the condition notes below carefully before requesting.

Condition:
* Status: Well used (since August 2023).
* Maintenance: Stainless steel frame is rust-free. The wheels still swivel smoothly.
* Hygiene: Thoroughly cleaned and disinfected.

Defects (Please Read):
* Wheel Lock: The lock on one of the wheels is spoiled. The other three wheels still lock, but please use with caution.
* Seat Condition: There is a small tear along the seam of the soft PU seat.

Specifications:
* Seat W x D: 15.5" x 16.5" (39.5 x 42 cm)
* Seat height: 19.75" (50 cm)
* Overall height: 37.5" (95 cm)
* Overall width: 20.7" (52.5 cm)
* Wheel size: 4" swivel wheel casters
* Product weight: 9.6 kg (Fixed Armrests)
* Weight capacity: 100 kg
* Material: Stainless steel (frame), PU (seat, backrest, armrest)
* To roll over toilet bowl, ensure height is less than 15.5" (39.5 cm) and width is less than 16" (41 cm)
passiton.location: Eunos, Geylang, Kembangan, Paya Lebar , Sims

passiton.name: Bion (C100) 2-in-1 Commode Shower Chair
passiton.description:
Multifunctional Toilet Chair
Bion Commode C100 is a 2-in-1 Commode Shower Chair that offers caregivers and users a safe and convenient bath experience. The commode shower chair includes a handy shower head holder and soap dish, offering caregivers convenience in keeping the shower head and soap in position.
passiton.dimensions: Overall Width (Open): 27.6" (70cm) Overall Height: 30.3" - 34.6 (77 - 88cm) Overall Length: 20.9" (53cm)
